name: Contrapunto
tagline: It's a good thing we can work on what we like.
description:
Contrapunto, created on May 20, 1974, was the first Spanish agency to win the Grand Prix of the Cannes Advertising Festival with the spot of the dog «Pippin» for TVE. But, above all, it is one of the agencies that has accumulated more campaigns of success and of great impact.
Currently, Contrapunto has offices in Madrid and Barcelona, ​​with a team of more than 100 professionals. Contrapunto is the most awarded agency in history in Spain.
